reviewComments: We have been camping here for some 30 years. Great local destination with great views from many campsites. Great value too, especially when using the Senior Discount pass.
New Hogan Lake.address: 3 New Hogan Parkway , Valley Springs , CA

reviewComments: I have played at La Contenta for many years. New Pro Shop is nice and staff who man it are very flexible with tee times. Well stocked too. Restaurant serves some very good food... read more
